org.hibernate.search.analyzer.impl

Class ScopedLuceneAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      • org.apache.lucene.analysis.AnalyzerWrapper
        • org.hibernate.search.analyzer.impl.ScopedLuceneAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class ScopedLuceneAnalyzer
extends AnalyzerWrapper
    A ScopedLuceneAnalyzer is a wrapper class containing all analyzers for a given class. ScopedLuceneAnalyzer behaves similar to PerFieldAnalyzerWrapper by delegating requests for TokenStreams to the underlying Analyzer depending on the requested field name.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard, Sanne Grinovero

    • Method Detail

      • isCompositeOfSameInstances

        public boolean isCompositeOfSameInstances(ScopedLuceneAnalyzer other)
        Compares the references of the global analyzer backing this ScopedAnalyzer and each scoped analyzer.
        Parameters:
        other - ScopedAnalyzer to compare to
        Returns:
        true if and only if the same instance of global analyzer is being used and all scoped analyzers also match, by reference.
